short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set titles of papers on arXiv as <title> of the pdf-tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fixes the tab's title to the name of the paper on arXiv pdf and abstract pages.

Especially useful if one is using an extension like The Great Suspender.
